definition: A term commonly used to refer to a cherished period or a beloved time, often associated with personal preferences and fond memories. It typically denotes a specific timeframe that holds special significance or brings great joy to an individual.

examples.german: Die Lieblingszeit vieler Menschen ist Weihnachten.
examples.english: Christmas is the favorite time of many people.

examples.german: Die Lieblingszeit meines Vaters ist der Herbst.
examples.english: My father's favorite time is autumn.
